gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The GOES-R X-Ray Sensor (XRS) Product consists of...

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: The GOES-R X-Ray Sensor (XRS) Product consists of.... NESDIS produces GOES-R EXIS XRS Level 1b products from GOES-R EXIS Level 0 source files. These output files span 30 seconds of one-second observations. NOAA's National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) then takes the 30-second files and aggregates them to produce daily EXIS XRS L1b products. These daily files are intended to be more convenient for users than the original 30-second files.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: These GOES-16 data have reached provisional maturity and are still undergoing testing. Users receiving these data through any dissemination means assume all risk related to their use and NOAA disclaims any and all warranties, whether express or implied, including (without limitation) any implied warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Cite this dataset when used as a source: GOES-R EXIS XRS L1b Data in Daily Aggregations. NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information.

NCEI cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NCEI makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. NCEI can only certify that the data it distributes are an authentic copy of the records that were accepted for inclusion in the NCEI archives.
